statements: SELECT * FROM loan_applications
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = TRUE
SELECT application_date, applicant_name FROM loan_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 50000
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, approval_status FROM loan_applications
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY application_date DESC
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = TRUE ORDER BY loan_amount ASC
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT application_id, approval_status FROM loan_applications ORDER BY application_id
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE application_id = 100;
SELECT application_date, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT approval_status, approval_date FROM approval_status;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;

SELECT la.application_id, la.applicant_name, la.loan_amount, as.approval_status, as.approval_date FROM loan_applications AS la INNER JOIN approval_status AS as ON la.application_id = as.application_id;

SELECT la.application_id, la.applicant_name, as.approval_status, as.approval_date FROM loan_applications AS la LEFT JOIN approval_status AS as ON la.application_id = as.application_id WHERE as.approval_status = 'APPROVED';
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT id, approval_status FROM loan_approvals WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT loan_id, SUM(repayment_amount) AS total_repayment FROM loan_repayments GROUP BY loan_id;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE applicant_name LIKE '%John%' AND loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT id, applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT loan_applications.applicant_name, loan_repayments.repayment_amount FROM loan_applications INNER JOIN loan_repayments ON loan_applications.id = loan_repayments.loan_id;

SELECT loan_approvals.approval_status, loan_applications.applicant_name, loan_approvals.approval_date FROM loan_approvals LEFT JOIN loan_applications ON loan_approvals.application_id = loan_applications.id WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM loan_applications
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000
SELECT approval_id, application_id, approval_date, approved_amount FROM loan_approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT repayment_id, approval_id, amount_paid FROM repayments WHERE amount_paid <= 1000
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT applicant_name, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT u.username, la.applicant_name, la.loan_amount, la.application_date, la.application_id FROM users u JOIN loan_approvals la ON u.user_id = la.application_id;

SELECT u.username, la.applicant_name, la.loan_amount, la.application_date, r.repayment_date, r.amount_paid FROM users u JOIN loan_approvals la ON u.user_id = la.application_id JOIN repayments r ON la.approval_id = r.approval_id WHERE r.amount_paid > 2000;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT application_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT application_id, approved_amount FROM loan_approvals WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loan_status ORDER BY status_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE application_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, phone_number FROM customer_details ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT application_id, approved_amount FROM loan_approvals WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT application_id, status FROM loan_status WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY status_date ASC;
SELECT application_id, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_payments FROM loan_repayments GROUP BY application_id HAVING total_payments > 5000;
